5486.quoteText:
we will not share your information without consent to a third party outside our organization except for the following reason. We may share the information collected with an external entity if we have a good-faith belief that access, use, preservation or disclosure of the information is reasonably necessary to:

  • Meet any applicable law, regulation, legal process or enforceable governmental request.
5486.title: The service is transparent regarding government requests or inquiries that may involve user data.

tosdr.case: The service is transparent regarding government requests or inquiries that may involve your data.

5487.title: This service provides archives of their terms of service so that changes can be viewed over time

tosdr.case: Archives of their agreements are provided so that changes can be viewed over time

5488.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

5489.quoteText:
Information Sale or Sharing

Any information we have about you will never be sold or rented to others, God willing (i.e., it is for internal use)
5489.title: This service does not sell your personal data

tosdr.case: Your personal data is not sold

5490.quoteText: You may opt out of any future contacts from us at any time
5490.title: You can opt out of promotional communications

tosdr.case: You can opt out of promotional communications

5491.quoteText: We do not use cookies except for some dynamic content, and for which only session cookies are used.</
5491.title: This service only uses temporary session cookies

tosdr.case: Only temporary session cookies are used

14110.quoteText: Some activity on this website is tracked using tracking code (Google analytics) for optimization purposes (goal is to understand what users like to read and to thereby, God willing, improve the user experience).
14110.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

tosdr.case: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

14111.quoteText:
You are also welcome to:

  • Access, change/correct any data we have about you
  • Have us delete any data we have about you.
14111.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data

tosdr.case: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
